Judul: MANAGING THE RISK OF NATURAL DISASTERS IN COASTAL ZONE: LESSONS LEARNED FROM TSUNAMI DISASTER IN NANGGROE ACEH DARUSSALAM PROVINCE
Abstrak: This research elaborates some tsunami risk management measures from India, Thailand and Japan regarding how to mitigate the impact of tsunami in the future, and considers some possibilities to be implemented and appropriate with the condition of NAD province coastal zone.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Prof.Dr.Ir. G.J.J. Linden, dan Arief Rosyidie, M.Arch, Ph.D.
Fakultas: Sekolah Arsitektur, Perencanaan dan Pengembangan Kebijakan
Kata Kunci: tsunami, earthquake, tsunami risk management measures, spatial and community measures
